CustomField.formula: if ( AND ( Price_with_Sales_Discount__c > 0, IsClosed = false, Coupon_Code__c <> "Ten off", Sales_Discount__c > 0, Text(Storage_Plan__c) <> "Annual Storage", NOT(ISBLANK(Text(Storage_Plan__c)))), Price_with_Sales_Discount__c - X10_Off__c, Null)
CustomField.label: New Price with 10% Discount
